Message:
One day, His Grace
asked me a question.
“Have you ever despised
your village or the Church
for what they did to you?”

...Not at all.
I carry no hate for
my village or the Church.

The only concerns I have are
the tragedies plaguing our world,
and the lives of those I must save.

If I am alone,
I know there will be
a limit to what I can do
with the little power
I possess.

if Your Grace and I
were to join together...!

I believe that this is
all part of God’s plan...

Being able to meet you,
and being able to walk
alongside you.

From this day forward,
I may stumble,
but I will not fall.

I shall not become weary
in doing good for the people
of the world...or for you...

So that one day,
when I reunite with
Grandma in Heaven,
I can boast about everything
I have done to make
the world a better place.
